add:
add ("pings") ("message") (day of week) (hour:minute)
Ex: add "everyone some_role" "some meeting" thursday 16:45
Ex: add "" "Alert" sunday 00:00
remove:
remove ("noti_message")
Ex: remove "Club Meeting" *(removes noti that matches message)*
list:
list (all?)
Ex: list *(returns notis in current channel)*
Ex: list all *(returns all notifications in server)*
set_perms_role:
set_perms_role ("role_name")
Ex: set_perms_role "Mod"
Ex: set_perms_role "Add notis"
now: returns the current time in server's timezone
